title: Well GD, it was an amazing run. Quitting League of Legends forever.
body:
I'll never forget the times I had on GD. I remember finding this place in Season One and I pretty much never left after that. I met so many people that I'm glad to call my friends because truth be told, I don't have any in real life. 

Thanks for everything, Ouroboro Garen

(no I am not going to play aram)
